sect2.title: Dependencies
sect2.para: Util-linux-&util-linux-depversion; needs the following to be installed:
sect2.literallayout: bash: sh binutils: as, ld fileutils: chgrp, chmod, cp, install, ln, mkdir, mv, rm gcc: cc, cpp glibc: rpcgen grep: grep make: make sed: sed sh-utils: uname, whoami textutils: cat
